question: You need to take leave from your work for almost a month for some personal reasons. Write a letter to your Manager. In your letter:• Explain the reason for your leave & the length of your leave.• Explain how you intend to deliver the task that was given to you recently and has to be turned in in a week’s time.• Explain how & who will look after your work while you are away.
text: I am writing this letter to obtain your kind approval for my one-month vacation request as I am going to get married. As per my marriage ceremony and travel plan dates, I am submitting my leave request from June 1 2022 to June 30-2022.

As you know, project deliveries are happening smoothly without any issues. In addition, I have been assigned  new work a week ago and before my vacation itself. Therefore, I will make a knowledge transfer plan in detail for everyone in our team. Hence, anyone can understand the requirement and how to deliver the client's work on time without any escalation.

However, I strongly believe that one of my team members will look after my roles and responsibilities during my vacation and sporadically I will get in touch with my team over the phone. Furthermore, I will join on call despite my busy schedule at home. Since  we do not want to see any escalations from our great customers.
I look forward to hearing a response to this request as I have to book my flight tickets to my place soon after your approval.
